name: @briebug/jest
description: Add jest to an Angular CLI project

scripts.clean:testApp: git checkout HEAD -- test-app && git clean -f -d test-app
scripts.clean:launch: npm run clean:testApp && npm run launch
scripts.test:app: cd test-app && npm run lint && npm run test -- --no-cache && npm run e2e && npm run build
scripts.test:ci: npm run clean:launch && npm run test:app && npm run clean:testApp
scripts.debug:
echo "debug not setup with @angular/schematics
> node --inspect-brk $(which schematics) .:addJest"
